channel.title: CVE Feed for David Vongries -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for David Vongries -- all products

item.title: CVE-2023-49822|2024-06-04T11:24:43.815Z -- david%20vongries -- ultimate%20dashboard
item.description: Exposure of Sensitive Information to an Unauthorized Actor vulnerability in David Vongries Ultimate Dashboard allows Accessing Functionality Not Properly Constrained by ACLs.This issue affects Ultimate Dashboard: from n/a through 3.7.10.

item.title: CVE-2023-50828|2023-12-21T14:50:26.284Z -- david%20vongries -- ultimate%20dashboard%20%E2%80%93%20custom%20wordpress%20dashboard
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in David Vongries Ultimate Dashboard – Custom WordPress Dashboard allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Ultimate Dashboard – Custom WordPress Dashboard: from n/a through 3.7.11.
